meanings.definition: A location connected to the internet that maintains one or more pages on the World Wide Web.
meanings.sent1: I visited a website to read about animals.
meanings.sent2: The website had many pictures of beautiful landscapes.
meanings.sent3: The website for funny cat videos always makes me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her website was a treasure trove of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The website's design was so appealing that I couldn't look away.

meanings.definition: A set of interconnected webpages, usually including a homepage, generally located on the same server, and prepared and maintained as a collection of information by a person, group, or organization.
meanings.sent1: The company's website showcased their products and services.
meanings.sent2: I found the website's navigation very user-friendly.
meanings.sent3: The website for penguin facts was surprisingly informative.
meanings.sent4: Her website was like a virtual library of resources.
meanings.sent5: The website's layout was so organized and easy to follow.
